name: Elon's Dream 2
description:
After an unsuccessful escape from Mars, our main character, a popular genius on Earth, engineer and cosmonaut Elon decides to base himself on the red Planet. He will again have to move through the most difficult landscapes to overcome from station to station with the help of a jetpack to adapt the inhospitable planet to colonization on its own. However, with new responsibilities come new troubles.

A new part of the indie platformer with a side view once again challenges players, this time you will have to cope with a naughty jetpack in conditions of limited visibility, avoid collisions with meteors and spatial holes, and all this, as always, in conditions of limited fuel reserves. However, not everything is so bad, because flexible Shinto palms can give a good jump at the most crucial moment, so do not forget about their "spring" properties =) you Will also be pleasantly surprised by the new pumping system that rewards every coin hunter.

Conquer the dusty and harsh land to prove all your numerous knowledge in practice!
